title: Statement from Former Prime Minister John Howard (Liberal Party of Australia)
text: ( Source : Liberal Party of Australia ) The Hon. John Howard OM AC Former Prime Minister Brian Loughnane has been a wonderful servant of the Liberal Party . His work as Federal Director for 12 years was instrumental in the many successes the
